{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Airlink+ |model=ARW027 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/29/2003 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Cameo |manuf_model=WLB-2203 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NHPWLB2203 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=7.5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8181 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8181 |wi1_chip2_brand=Philips |wi1_chip2_model=SA2400A |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SB |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|802.11b Wireless Router}}
{{ProductPage|http://www.airlinkplus.com/wireless/arw027.htm}} The firmware for this device identifies this router as a WLB-2203. Per the manual, the default SSID may be '''default'''. The default password is ''blank''. [http://www.lemmke.org/arl/DATA/hardware/other/small_network_appliances/small_network_appliances.4.en.html On the Lemmke list] ==Images== [[File:Airlink+ ARW027.jpg]][[Has images::external| ]]
